overview: Adam & Eve present 4 hours of gorgeous guys and erotic romance in this compilation "Man Of Your Dreams". The female fans have spoken! Adam & Eve's hottest and most in-demand male performers star in this 12 scenes and over four hours. Each guy is known for studly looks, amazing performance, and the ability to leave women everywhere breathless with desire. Every erotic scene gives the ladies plenty of eye candy!
title: Man of Your Dreams
